basics.name: Anton Galitsyn
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: I am passionate about creating software products, which can improve every-day life. I always tend to be a diligent person, concentrate upon an objectives and work out it properly. It’s important for me to have self-possession and to be laid-back and modest person for team-members.

work.summary: Parallels Presence Builder team. Interactive web site builder.
highlights: Project was created in 2004, legacy codebase with layered architecture
Integrated with Plesk panel and Cpanel

work.summary: Parallels Automation team. Shared Hosting Module.
highlights: Also development of dispatcher component - web app written in PHP (Symfony 2, Doctrine, APS2, Dojo)
Multiple integration points: REST, CLI, RPC

work.summary: Continuous delivery team. Building private cloud and application delivery platform.
highlights: Integration of Openstack as private cloud solution
Openstack custom development, admisitration and support (Icehouse - Kilo)
Also participated in messenger team as backend developer

work.summary: Application team. Developing management layer for distributed services on Kubernetes.
highlights: Lots of kubernetes, docker and etcd
Working on application lifecycles, (create, upgrade, downgrade atomic operations)
Participated in market-data app, as developer (go, kafka, postgres) and devops (CI/CD, deploy, monitoring, logging)
Participated in integration of company-wide kubernetes cluster as developer of logging system (go, clickhouse, fluent-bit)
Participated as developer (go, postgres) and devops (CI/CD, deploy, monitoring, logging)

education.institution: Siberian State University of Telecommunications and Information Sciences

skills.name: Project management
keywords: Small team management, Scrum and Kanban practices

Building apps for Kubernetes using Helm
